sentences.en: His dazed eyes stare at the eels, which still writhe and entwine.
sentences.cn: 他茫然地盯着那些仍在扭动缠绕的鳗鱼。

sentences.en: They surely writhe under this pressure.
sentences.cn: 他们肯定对这种压力感到苦恼。

sentences.en: The fifth hooded shape began to writhe atop the wagon.
sentences.cn: 第五个戴着兜帽的形体，开始在马车上翻滚起来。
